long_description: The men's prAna Inception Jacket uses a heathered-look fabric that gives an urban spin to this waterproof, breathable rain jacket. it's also quick drying, making it great for travel. Jacket is made of 2.5-layer waterproof, breathable laminate and is fully seam-sealed for added weatherproofing. Durable water repellent finish helps rain bead up and roll off. Water-resistant center-front zipper. Men's prAna Inception Jacket features an adjustable hood. Mesh vents at the center back and inside the zippered welt hand pockets ehance airflow. Adjustable rip-and-stick cuff tabs seal out wind and rain.
short_description: The men's prAna Inception Jacket uses a heathered-look fabric that gives an urban spin to this waterproof, breathable rain jacket. it's also quick drying, making it great for travel.
